title: A Trip to Mars (Sci-Fi, 1918) Gunnar Tolnæs, Zanny Petersen | Colorized Movie (Silent Film)

sources.title: A Trip to Mars (Sci-Fi, 1918) Gunnar Tolnæs, Zanny Petersen | Colorized Movie (Silent Film)
sources.description:
A group of Earth researchers journey to Mars and are astonished to find a peaceful, vegetarian civilization. They team up with the Martians to bring their advanced wisdom back to Earth, inspired by the navy captain and his crew's transformative voyage through space.

Original title: Himmelskibet (1918)  AKA: A Trip to Mars 

Black & White version:  https://youtu.be/2blVjZvq0Vc


This film is available with subtitles in many language options.

Director: Holger-Madsen
Writers: Sophus Michaëlis, Ole Olsen
Stars: Gunnar Tolnæs, Zanny Petersen, Nicolai Neiiendam
Genres: Colorized classics, Adventure, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Silent Film


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
00:10 A scientific expedition to Mars is planned, a spaceship is built, and volunteers are invited for the journey.
14:12 A dramatic journey to Mars unfolds with conflicts, sacrifices, and uncertainties among a group of explorers.
27:28 Exploration of Mars leads to atonement and peace after a potential war is averted.
44:38 A journey to Mars brings enlightenment, love, and acceptance of death.
1:06:00 Exploration of Mars leads to discovery of universal love and unity among civilizations.
